hero.heading: Dr.-Ing. M. Saeed Mafipour
hero.subHeading: A software developer based in Munich, Germany, creating seamless apps for digital experiences. Explore my works and let's get in touch for collaboration.

aboutMeSection.heading: About Me
aboutMeSection.description:
I am a **software/full-stack developer** with a background in **AI**, **digitalization**, and **web development**, specializing in building intelligent and scalable applications. I earned my **Dr.-Ing./Ph.D. in Engineering** from the **Technical University of Munich (TUM)** and spent four years as a research assistant and postdoctoral researcher. During this time, I worked on cutting-edge projects focused on bringing automation and AI-based solutions to the construction environment.

My expertise extends from frontend to backend development. On the frontend, I specialize in **React**, **Next.js**, **Tailwind CSS**, and **TypeScript** to create seamless and scalable user interfaces. For backend development, I utilize **MongoDB**, **PostgreSQL**, and **Prisma** to design efficient and well-structured databases. My workflow is enhanced with **Docker**, **Git**, and **CI/CD pipelines**, ensuring smooth deployment and maintainability of applications.

I am currently focused on developing **digital solutions** that streamline workflows, optimize processes, and enhance decision-making in complex industries. I am highly interested in creating **web applications** that are partially or heavily supported by **AI**. I am skilled in utilizing the following technologies:

techs.title: Programming
techs.subtitle: Languages, data formats, and Scripting Technologies

techs.title: Frontend
techs.subtitle: Building interactive and responsive user interfaces

techs.title: Backend
techs.subtitle: Building scalable, efficient, and secure server-side applications

projects.title: Next Cabin
projects.subtitle: Technologies
projects.description: An e-commerce app for reserving cabins, featuring a user dashboard, geolocation, complex filtering and search system, secure authentication, and more.

projects.title: Next Store
projects.subtitle: Technologies
projects.description: An e-commerce platform for purchasing products, featuring an admin dashboard, seamless payments, secure authentication, and more.

projects.title: Next Robot
projects.subtitle: Technologies
projects.description: An industrial application built for a robotics company, providing detailed information about robots, their applications, and a contact form for inquiries.

projects.title: Next Chat
projects.subtitle: Technologies
projects.description: A Next.js-powered API for integrating large language models (LLMs), offering functionality similar to ChatGPT with the added flexibility to choose from 10 different LLMs.

projects.title: MSFD-Net
projects.subtitle: Technologies
projects.description: A reasearch project conducted at TUM to develop a 3D deep learning architecture for semantic segmentation of large-scale bridge point clouds.

projects.title: TwinGen
projects.subtitle: Technologies
projects.description: A reasearch project conducted at TUM to develop a plugin for Autodesk Revit to generate the 3D model of bridges from their point clouds.

certificates.title: TensorFlow Developer Certificate
certificates.subtitle: Deep Learning and Machine Learning Certification
certificates.description: Awarded upon passing a five-hour online programming exam that tests proficiency in TensorFlow, including the ability to build and train neural networks for computer vision, NLP, and time-series forecasting.

certificates.title: Dr.-Ing./Ph.D. Certificate
certificates.subtitle: Qualification Program in Engineering and Design
certificates.description: Awarded upon the successful completion of a four-year research program at the Technical University of Munich (TUM), Munich, Germany, specializing in engineering and design.
certificates.awardedBy: Technical University of Munich (TUM), TUM Graduate School
